additionalLossCondition.name: Hunters Swarm the Island
additionalLossCondition.description: Put <beasts> Destroyed by Adversary rules on this panel. If there are ever more <beasts> on this panel than on the island, the Invaders win.

escalation.name: Stalk the Predators
escalation.description: {escalation}  On each board: Add 2 <explorer> (total) among lands with <beasts>. If you can't, instead add 2 <explorer> among lands with <beasts> on a different board.

levels.name: Hunters Bring Home Shell and Hide

steps.description: During Setup, on each board, add 1 <beasts> and 1 <explorer> to the highest-numbered land without <town>/<city>.

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: When Ravage adds <blight> to a land (including cascades), Destroy 1 <beasts> in that land.

levels.name: A Sense for Impending Disaster
levels.staticInformation: The first time each Action would Destroy <explorer>: If possible, 1 of those <explorer> is instead Pushed; 1 Fear when you do so.

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: Ravage Cards also match lands with 3 or more <explorer>. (If the land already matched the Ravage Card, it still Ravages just once.)
When making the Invader Deck, put 1 Stage III Card after each Stage II Card. (New Deck Order: 111-2-3-2-3-2-3-2-33)

levels.name: Entrench in the Face of Fear

steps.description: Put an unused Stage II Invader Card under the top 3 Fear Cards, and an unused Stage III Card under the top 7 Fear Cards.

levels.staticInformation: When an Invader Card in the Fear Deck is revealed, immediately place it in the Build space (face-up).

steps.name: Ravage
steps.description: After the Ravage Step of turn 2+, on each board where it added no <blight>: In the land with the most <explorer> (min. 1), add 1 <explorer> and 1 <town>.
